sage.scripting

Class ScriptManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.scripting.ScriptManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScriptManager

    public abstract class ScriptManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScriptManager
    This class acts as the abstract base class from which all concrete script managers are derived. It provides functions common to all script managers, deferring the implementation of most IScriptManager methods to concrete subclasses.
    Author:
    Kenneth Barnett

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScriptManager(java.lang.String scriptExtension) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addScript(IScript script)
      Adds the specified IScript to the ScriptManager's collection of scripts if the script is not null.
      DataScript createDataScript(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns a DataScript created using the script specified by filename
      javax.script.ScriptEngine getEngine()
      Returns the ScriptManager's ScriptEngine.
      javax.script.Invocable getInvocableEngine()
      Returns an InvocableEngine using the ScriptManager's ScriptEngine.
      boolean getIsActive()
      Returns TRUE if the ScriptManager is initialized and ready to function; FALSE otherwise.
      void removeScript(IScript script)
      Removes the specified IScript from the ScriptManager's collection of scripts.
      void update(float time)
      Updates all the BehaviorScript scripts registered with the ScriptManager by calling their update() function.
      protected abstract boolean validateScriptExtension(java.lang.String fileExtension)
      Returns TRUE if fileExtension is identical to required script file extension; FALSE otherwise.
